datetime.display: Saturday, January 18, 2020 at 7:00 PM – 10:00 PM EST

details:
From Brattleboro, VT, local singer-songwriter, Tim Cardiello (Moon Hollow, The Dank Steaks, The Stinky Boots String Band) will be back at The Pizza Stone VT playing a solo set of original music plus some eclectic covers. This show marks the 3rd date of a three month tour across the USA with Canadian artist, VANWHO, from Montréal, Quebec. 

Vanwho's music is a fusion of refined folk accents, smoky vocals, and tasteful, unique guitar stylings that will keep you captivated. Contemplative, ethereal, intimate and dreamy; the songs of Vanwho invite the listener on a timeless journey that explores what it means to be alive in the moment. This music is haunting and disarming and totally rocks!

Moon hollow, 

Specializing in both original music and unique covers in the styles of folk, bluegrass, jamgrass, early jazz, blues, indie folk and alt-country.

title: The Pizza Stone VT Presents // Vanwho + Moon Hollow
